Extract forest inventory

Source: R/get_forest.trollsim.R
get_forest.Rd

get_forest() extract the forest inventory from TROLL outputs.

get_forest(sim, ...)

# S4 method for class 'trollsim'
get_forest(sim, ...)

Arguments

sim

trollsim or trollstack.

...

unused argument.

Value

data.frame()

See also

trollsim(), trollstack(), troll(), stack()

Examples


data("TROLLv3_output")
head(get_forest(TROLLv3_output))
